title: Exclusive Track: Radiohead – IL-ĠIMGĦA
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/0036-copy-900x600.jpg "0036 copy")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6170-exclusive-track-radiohead-%e2%80%93-il-gimgha/attachment/0036-copy)

Boy have we got a treat for you! An EXCLUSIVE new Radiohead track, rumoured to be taken from their as yet unannounced follow up to The King Of Limbs. Obtained through a unnameable source, the bizzarely titled IL-ĠIMGĦA sees Yorke in an extremely black mood; choruses of “ah-ah” introduce the track, before the Radiohead frontman’s vocals come in. “Got to make my mind up” whines Yorke over an excruciatingly complex un-rhythmic beat. With The King Of Limbs being received to mixed reviews, this track may go someway to re-igniting the passion some of their loyal fans have lost for the band.

 [Radiohead – IL-ĠIMGĦA](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad/radiohead-il-img-a) by [crackintheroad](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad)
